attributes.action: Call for an immediate ceasefire and protect the people of palestine!
attributes.additional_details: To help the defenceless people of Palestine because everyday they watch their home get destroyed, family members being killed and have to worry about surviving another day it needs to end!
attributes.background: Call for an immediate ceasefire and protect the people of Palestine who are currently without basic human essentials!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649130
